name: section508dash
description: Web services to see 508 compliance predictions for solicitations posted to FBO

scripts.old-test: export NODE_ENV=test || SET NODE_ENV=test && mocha server/**/*.test.js
scripts.backup-db: export PGPASSWORD=of2fbobp423i89ztu7g7d136h && pg_dump -U utz6kah1zq8t2nyg -d cgawsbrokerprodgq3wrvn8c8a772q -h 192.168.1.126 > srt-database.sql
scripts.restore-db: rm -f srt-database.sql* srt-database.sql.gz && cp srt-database-export.sql.gz srt-database.sql.gz && gzip -d srt-database.sql.gz && export PGPASSWORD=of2fbobp423i89ztu7g7d136h && dropdb -U utz6kah1zq8t2nyg -h 192.168.1.126 cgawsbrokerprodgq3wrvn8c8a772q && createdb -U utz6kah1zq8t2nyg -h 192.168.1.126 cgawsbrokerprodgq3wrvn8c8a772q && psql -U utz6kah1zq8t2nyg -d cgawsbrokerprodgq3wrvn8c8a772q -h 192.168.1.126 <srt-database.sql

author: TCG
